attributes.action: Remove gluten containing ingredients from the exemptions list.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With reference to Commission Directive 2007/68/EC paragraph (4.
The signatures on this petition request that all gluten containing ingredients be removed from the exemptions list and are labelled accordingly. Adverse reactions are the result of consuming unknown/unlabelled gluten foods contained in the exemptions list. Susceptible individuals being Coeliac Disease sufferers and others.
